title: Hibachi Chateaubriand is 8.5 ounces of center cut tenderloin
statement: The Hibachi Chateaubriand menu item consists of 8.5 ounces of center cut tenderloin and mushrooms lightly seasoned.

citations.quote: HIBACHI CHATEAUBRIAND* 8.5 ounces of center cut tenderloin and mushrooms lightly seasoned.
